game.title: The Journey of the Golden Key
game.objective: Retrieve the Golden Key to unlock the ancient treasure
game.description: Legend tells of a hidden treasure that can only be unlocked with the Golden Key. Embark on a perilous journey to find the Golden Key and claim the riches that lie within.

task.description: Navigate through treacherous jungles and ancient ruins to locate the Lost Temple
task.location: Deep within the heart of the Forbidden Jungle

task.description: Confront the temple guardians and solve complex puzzles to acquire the Golden Key
task.location: The inner chambers of the Lost Temple

task.description: Journey back to the quest giver and present the Golden Key to claim your reward
